Main Menu

The main menu class contains the elements to render the main window and the logic to connect to the rest of the module.

class GUI.main.mainmenu

Instantiates and runs the main window of the GUI.

We can separate the functions into 7 different categories

Window Structure

Responsible for the correct position and size of different Gui elements.

GUI.main.mainmenu.add_elements(self)

Adds all tkinter elements to the main window.

GUI.main.mainmenu.grid_elements(self)

Sets the position of all tkinter elements in the main window.

GUI.main.mainmenu.add_styles(self)

Sets the style from the styles folder for all the application.

Submenu Handling

Responsible for creating and managing information from submenus

GUI.main.mainmenu.open_menu(self, menutype: str)

rest text

Parameters

menutype – the type of the menu to open, options -> config, setup, paths

GUI.main.mainmenu.extract_config_on_close(self, config_menu: menu)

Awaits for the configuration menu to be closed and retrieves the information on it.

Parameters

config_menu – the config menu object that was instantiated.

GUI.main.mainmenu.extract_info_on_close(self, setup_window: menu)

Awaits for the setup menu to be closed and retrieves the information on it.

Parameters

setup_window – the setup menu object that was instantiated.

GUI.main.mainmenu.pathmenu_teardown(self, pathmenu: menu)

Runs consistency checks with the pathmenu is closed.

Parameters

pathmenu – the path menu object that was instantiated.

Execution

These functions handle the execution of the model module.

GUI.main.mainmenu.run_experimentation(self)

Initializes the experimentation based on the setup window data.

GUI.main.mainmenu.run_tests(self)

Initializes the testing based on the setup window data.

Thread Handling

Launching threads and mantaining their states.

GUI.main.mainmenu.kill_all_threads(self)

stops all execution threads

GUI.main.mainmenu.mainthread(self, is_train: bool)

starts the execution of the testing or training modules

Parameters

is_train – if True it starts the training thread, it starts the testing thread otherwise.

Error Handling

Visual updates to report errors to the user.

GUI.main.mainmenu.showbusyerror(self)

displays a busy error in an error window.

GUI.main.mainmenu.change_error_text(self, newtext: str)

updates the error text at the bottom of the main window.

Parameters

newtext – text to diplay.

Updates

Handles the updating of the different parts of the GUI and program

GUI.main.mainmenu.update_connectors(self)

Initializes new connectors for the trainer and testing modules based on the config and setup window results.

GUI.main.mainmenu.update_progress(self, is_train: bool)

main loop of the progress section, it checks the connector periodically for new information and updates the main window based on the result.

Parameters

is_train – which of the update loops to run, if True it updates the trainer loop, tester otherwise.

GUI.main.mainmenu.launch_updater(self, is_train: bool)

Initializes the updater thread and starts it.

Parameters

is_train – which of the loops to start, Training if True, Testing otherwise.

GUI.main.mainmenu.change_progtext(self, newtext: str)

modifies the progress texts in the main window.

Parameters

newtext – the text to display

GUI.main.mainmenu.set_progbar_value(self, v: int)

modifies the progressbar current internal value in the main window.

Parameters

v – the new value.

GUI.main.mainmenu.change_progbar_max(self, qtty: int)

modifies the progressbar max internal value in the main window.

Parameters

qtty – the new value.

GUI.main.mainmenu.update_all_progress(self, curr: int, tot: int, text: int)

updates all progress information simultaneously.

Parameters

  • curr – the current progess info

  • tot – the maximum progress info

  • text – the current text progress

Miscellaneous

Miscellaneous helper functions.

GUI.main.mainmenu.open_folder(self, folder: str)

Opens the selected folder for the user, adjusting based on the OS. Should work for Linux, Windows, Mac & WSL.

Parameters

folder – name of the folder to open, options -> datasets, agents

GUI.main.mainmenu.intercept_close(self)

overrides the colsing function of the main window and shows a warning if needed.
